title: Create a Group Rooming List
description: A corporate client has signed a contract for a block of rooms and has sent the list of guest names to be assigned to those rooms.

tasks.description: Retrieve the group block reservation in the PMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds the master group block.

tasks.description: Enter the names from the client's list into the individual reservations within the block.
tasks.expected_outcome: All guest names are accurately entered against the reserved rooms.

tasks.description: Send a confirmation of the completed rooming list back to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client receives a confirmation that all their guests are registered.
